debiasLLMReporting 0.0.1

Package index

Core Estimators

Main functions for debiased prevalence estimation

ppi_point_and_ci()
Prediction-powered mean estimator with logit CI.
ppi_pp_point_and_ci_general()
Tuned PPI++ estimator using numeric lambda search.
llm_point_and_ci()
LLM-as-a-judge corrected estimator with finite-sample adjustment.
eif_point_and_ci()
EIF (Efficient Influence Function) estimator for binary surrogates.

Bootstrap Methods

Bootstrap-based confidence intervals

ppi_bootstrap()
Bootstrap PPI estimator
rg_bootstrap()
Bootstrap Rogan-Gladen (LLM) estimator

Helper Functions

Utility functions

bootstrap_ci()
Bootstrap confidence interval using percentile method.
logit_ci()
Wald-style confidence interval via logit transform.

Visualization

Plotting functions for simulation results

plot_coverage()
Plot empirical coverage across simulation settings
plot_ci_width()
Plot mean confidence interval width across simulation settings
plot_bias()
Plot estimator bias across simulation settings
plot_bias_pct()
Plot percent bias across simulation settings
plot_q_bias()
Plot calibration bias for \(\hat q_0\) and \(\hat q_1\)
build_line_plot()
Generic line plot builder
generate_plot_suite()
Generate all 5 standard plots for a given data subset
get_method_color_scale()
Get the fixed color scale for methods
plot_base_theme()
Base theme for standard plots
plot_base_theme_aggregate()
Larger legend theme for aggregate plots (stacked in two rows)
format_label_ratio()
Format a labeling ratio as a percentage string
